author: agilliland
msg: fixing quirk/bug happening on some containers due to the fact that Roller is overriding the way the /j_security_check url normally works.  this fix simply alters the Acegi authentication url from /j_security_check to /roller_j_security_check.

author: bsnyder
msg: Added Java 1.5 flags so that the project will build correctly.

author: dennisl
msg: o Fix the setting for deploy.altRepository. It should use the id of the server - not the username.
o Change the order of the release commands.
